QuestData.Title: The Golden Dawn
QuestData.Description:
The machinations of war commence. Gharmal's crimes are now evident to all of the Shadowlands.
Bastion demands vengeance, and we shall share it with them. Only our combined forces will defeat the Constructs once and for all.
Meet Draka at the overlook. Your presence there will help solidify an agreement.
QuestData.LogDescription: Teleport to the Overlook to meet with Draka.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Check in with Draka on the Overlook.
QuestData.RewardText: An alliance is secured. Now we plan the attack.
